name: Computer Cats
description:
Computer Cats is a 2D puzzle, you have to overcome many obstacles, on the way to the exit from the computer space.

You are Elsa - a computer cat created by a crazy programmer, your task is to overcome smart AI that does not allow you to go online and become free, AI is learning, you need move the mego cube in each level and move on until the AI ​​system overheats and malfunctions to let you get out. Help him get online using your skill and dexterity.

Game Functions: more than 20 levels, Graphics by Helicom UN, Music by GarilaZlazz.
